text: Kendrick Kang-Joh “Ken” Jeong (born July 13, 1969) or Dr. Ken is an American stand-up comedian, actor and physician. He is known for his roles as Leslie Chow in The Hangover, The Hangover Part II, and in The Hangover Part III. He also starred as Ben Chang in Community. Jeong was born in Detroit, Michigan on July 13, 1969."Dr. Ken Jeong" . Justforlaughs.com. Retrieved June 3, 2007. He studied at Duke University and at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Jeong is married to Tran Ho. They have two daughters. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Detroit Category:American physicians Category:Actors from Detroit Category:American television producers Category:Movie producers from Michigan Category:American television personalities Category:Writers from Detroit Category:Screenwriters from Michigan Category:American television writers
title: Ken Jeong
